events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position including their resume and cover letter highlighting relevant experience.
Application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords related to software development and engineering skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide the candidate through the recruitment process and answer any questions.
Initial phone screening was conducted to discuss the candidateâ€™s experience, motivation, and basic technical knowledge relevant to the engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly with availability times for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
A technical interview with the lead engineer has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills, problem solving, and system design.
